Translations.Text: Nessader ip id, ih, deg iv ioqan. Ih, Nekwni, Nella d ineddaoen
Iban ed degs, yal lameo uuwib
Lameo s$uone£. Ih, Nekwni Nella d wid Ippaznen
Aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ih, Neppa Isell, d Amusnaw
Mass n tmurt, igenwan akked wayen illan garasen, ma tepputebbtem
Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Issidir, Ineqq. D Mass nnwen, u Mass n lejdud nnwen, imezwura
Qaoaa ass, ideg ara d iawi igenni, abbu ipbegginen
Ad i$umm imudanen. Wagi d aaaqeb aqeoean
A Mass nne$! Kkes a$ aaaqeb; nekwni d lmumnin
Amek ara saun asmekti, wanag iusa ten id Umazan ipbegginen
D$a wexxoen as, u nnan: "d aselmad aoehbani". ²
Ma Nessenqes awen cwii uaaqeb, ihi, kunwi, a ppu$alem ar din
Ass ideg ara Needem fellasen, eeedma tabarart, war ccekk, a d Nerr ppao
Ni$ Njeooeb, uqbel nnsen, agdud n Feraun. Iusa ten id umazan ukyis
Seddut yidi imdanen n Oebbi; nek, $uowen, d amazan muman
